block.p: APPLIED DIGITAL SOLUTIONS INC., Palm Beach, Fla. an electronic commerce systems provider, terminated its plan to acquire ATEC Group Inc., Hauppauge, N.Y., a systems integrator, because of difficult market conditions.
SWIFT TRANSPORTATION CO., Phoenix, said its chief executive, Jerry Moyes, had offered to buy the trucking company Simon Transportation Services Inc. for $7 a share in cash, a total of $39 million.

APPLIED DIGITAL SOLUTIONS INC., Palm Beach, Fla. an electronic commerce systems provider, terminated its plan to acquire ATEC Group Inc., Hauppauge, N.Y., a systems integrator, because of difficult market conditions.
SWIFT TRANSPORTATION CO., Phoenix, said its chief executive, Jerry Moyes, had offered to buy the trucking company Simon Transportation Services Inc. for $7 a share in cash, a total of $39 million.
CALPINE CORP., San Jose, Calif., which has electricity projects in 21 states and Canada, said it planned to build a natural gas-fired power plant near Fremont, Ohio, for $340 million.
UNITED RENTALS INC., Greenwich, Conn., the largest industrial and construction equipment rental company in North America, said it planned to repurchase as much as $200 million of its common stock.
